name: The Carpet Caravan
description:
Bugs:

Please play in Full Screen, there is a bug where carpets only appear when in the top left corner.
Please keep moving during your first carpet pickup, otherwise you'll die.

This is my entry for Godot Wild Jam 29, themed 'Nomad'. It is a simple Snake variant.

You are a nomad traveling through the desert and make a living by selling carpets. As you build your wealth, others will seek to join your caravan.

Move with the arrow keys.

Remember to drink (by collecting water), or you will die of thirst!
Pick up carpets to get coins (score). The higher your score, the faster you move and the more water you will need.

---
This is my first game made with Godot. I had to sack my previous idea midway through because it was unrealistic :D I know the result is very poor but I did manage to learn a bunch of things I had set out to learn about :)
